description:
You are D. Landis, a tormented young man who wants to run away from Hell’s Creek to become a pro surfer. When you’re about to leave the village in your convertible, Sheriff Naschy steps in your way to capture you.
Because you are a werewolf, and monsters never leave Hell’s Creek.
You will need to run through some of the most iconic American cities in a frenetic chase, defeating the men recruited by the Sheriff.
Will you survive the hordes of enemies to reach L.A.?

A BEAT’N’UP NOSTALGIA FULL OF REFERENCES
An American Werewolf in L.A. is the sequel in spirit of the 80s’ horror classic.
A tribute to cinema and videogames of that era in arcade format for one or two player(s) locally.
Staying true to the most traditional Beat’n’Up style!

FEATURES
Frenetic Beat’n’Up game in the classic arcade games style.
Five action-fueled levels.
More than 10 different enemies to defeat.
Local multiplayer for two players.
Sequel in spirit of the 80s’ classic.
name: An American Werewolf in L.A.
